page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: FARMING FEW FARMERS HAVE ALL THE NECCESARY EQUIPMENT HAY , SILAGE MAKING & RELY ON CONTRACTORS TO CUT , BALE . THERE IS LITTLE OR NO CEREAL CROP . NO PIGS OR CHICKENS ARE KEPT ON A LARGE SCALE , BUT A FEW DO KEEP A SOME FOR HOME CONSUMPTION . ONE FARM FATTENS TURKEYS FOR THE CHRISTMAS TRADE SELLING MOSTLY TO REGULAR CUSTOMERS . FARMERS SEND THEIR LIVESTOCK TO OSWESTRY OR WELSHPOOL MARKETS BUT FOR THE LAST TWO YEARS LLANFYLLIN MARKET HAS BECOME INCREASINGLY POPULAR FOR SELLING FAT LAMBS & STORES .
